title: Pin Request
body:
Heya,

May we have this pinned please? It's relevant information and has to do with our client. --> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/4YAFyi4P-is-your-updated-client-not-working-youve-come-to-the-right-place

Thank you! *gives poro snax*

replies.body:
Hey there!  We had this thread pinned for quite a while actually as we all transitioned to the updated client.  At this point, we're happy to help individually if anyone is having an issue with using or updating the new client!  We also have patch megathreads which still contains a lot of this info. 

 Thanks for the suggestion, even if I haven't earned the poro snax this time around.  :P
